caption.center: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. James HILL, Appellant.

opinion.posture: Appeal No. 69 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1995 from the Order of the Superior Court dated February 10, 1995, at No. 1592 Phila. 1993, affirming the Judgments of sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County, at Nos.Page 58 1468-1471, 1473, 1474, 1476, 1477 August Term 1988,442 Pa. Super. 675, 660 A.2d 653 (1995).
opinion.panel: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 16th day of July, 1996, the above-captioned appeal is hereby dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
